question: Which of the following system in an octahedral complex has maximum unpaired electrons?
explanation: A. <katex>$d^4$</katex> low spin: <katex>$t_{2g}^4 e_g^0$</katex> -> 2 unpaired electrons.
B. <katex>$d^7$</katex> high spin: <katex>$t_{2g}^5 e_g^2$</katex> -> 3 unpaired electrons.
C. <katex>$d^9$</katex> high spin: <katex>$t_{2g}^6 e_g^3$</katex> -> 1 unpaired electron.
D. <katex>$d^6$</katex> low spin: <katex>$t_{2g}^6 e_g^0$</katex> -> 0 unpaired electrons.
